home.title: PKU + THU Joint Postdoc Forum in Astronomy and Astrophysics 2025
home.subtitle: A two-day event designed to spark new collaborations and foster awareness of ongoing research
home.description: The joint Postdoc Forum in Astronomy and Astrophysics, co-hosted by the Kavli Institute of Astronomy and Astrophysics at Peking University (KIAA) and the Department of Astronomy at Tsinghua University (DoA), will be a two-day event (December 1 and 2) designed to spark new collaborations and foster awareness of ongoing research.
home.early_registration: Early registration is encouraged to secure a talk or poster slot!

features.posters: Poster sessions for postdocs and PhD students
features.topics: All topics welcome: observational astronomy, theoretical astrophysics, machine learning, etc.
features.meals: Lunch and coffee breaks provided on both days
